english.segment1: I said my goodbyes to the sun. my little one, so far away. And how strange, how small we must become. yet as familiar as yesterday
english.segment2: The bluest iris that I'd ever seen. SHe vanished like a dream, sinking back. into the ground. Singing "maybe I wept real tears". but maybe she was hiding because she wanted to be found. You wanted to be found!
english.segment3: Don't be afraid of him. Be still.
